                          com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.form.TriggerField<java.util.Date>
                              com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.form.DateField
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class DateField
extends TriggerField<java.util.Date>

Provides a date input field with a DatePicker dropdown and automatic date validation.
